definition: the bulb of the fritillary (Fritillaria thunbergii)

sentences.english: A taxonomic study of Fritillaria from Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 新疆贝母属植物分类研究。

sentences.english: The anticlinal wall of epidermic cell looks like waves.
sentences.chinese: 于贝母表皮细胞垂周壁多波状弯曲。

sentences.english: ConclusionThis method can be used for medicines Fritillaria identification and analysis.
sentences.chinese: 结论此方法可以用于中药材贝母的鉴别和分析。

sentences.english: A concise report on the study of the Chemical structures of Fritillaria alkaloids is given.
sentences.chinese: 简明报导贝母植物碱化学结构的研究。

sentences.english: An HPLC-ESI/MS method was developed for analysis of alkaloids in Bulbus Fritillariae.
sentences.chinese: 此方法可用于对市场上川贝母和浙贝母的质量监控。

sentences.english: An HPLC-ESI/MS method was developed for analysis of alkaloids in Bulbus Fritillariae.
sentences.chinese: 此方法可用于对市场上川贝母和浙贝母的质量监控。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish an HPLC method for the determination of adenosine in F.
sentences.chinese: 目的采用HPLC法测定平贝母中腺苷的含量。

sentences.english: Studies on the Alkaloid Constituents of Fritillaria pallidiflora Schrenk.
sentences.chinese: 伊贝母生物碱成分的研究。

sentences.english: Objective To search the cause of high yield of Fritillari thunbergii from Nantong Jiangsu province in south Zhejiang area.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨江苏南通浙贝母种茎在浙南地区高产的原因。

sentences.english: The soil texture difference among nine-origins reaches significant level.
sentences.chinese: 不同产地平贝母生境土壤质地差异达到了显著水平。

definition: mother-of-pearl (used in ornamentation and in TCM)
Sichuan fritillary bulb (Bulbus fritillariae cirrhosae, used in TCM)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
